OSC Fellows are early career researchers who do not have a PhD degree and who are (co-)leading grassroots initiatives or (co-)deliver training on open research. We are grateful for their valuable contributions! [Become a Fellow](../about/join-us.qmd) <i class="bi bi-box-arrow-up-right"></i>.
